ComicInfo.Title: Silent Cathedrals, Part Four: Revelations!
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 4 of the 6-part 'Silent Cathedrals.' The villainous Dr. Sugarman stands at the threshold of immortality when he catches up to David Kim and Nun of the Above.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:53:48. [CVDB39665] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 04:40:06. [Issue ID 55704]

ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Brozowski,J. J. Birch,J. J. Birch
ComicInfo.Colorist: Noelle Giddings,Noelle C. Giddings,Noelle C. Giddings
